summary: RECEIVED LETTER NOV.17 FOR RECALL   REF. TOO...."MAY HAVE INSUFFICIENT ELECTRICAL GROUNDING. WANT TO KNOW WHAT THE HOLD UP IS ON GETTING THIS TAKEN CARE OF.? ITS BEEN OVER 6 MOS.  THIS IS SECOND RECALL ON MY GLA250...PLEASE TAKE CARE OF THIS EXPEDITIOUSLY.. THERE IS NO EXCUSE FOR WAITING THIS LONG  FOR REPAIR ON MY VEHICLE.  GET OFF YOUR BACK SIDE AND GET THIS DONE.
